segments.text: Do you get up early every morning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About 6 in the morning . I like to walk to the office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good habit . How long does it take ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About 20 minutes . Do you live alone ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , my little sister lives with me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About 12 . She is a good girl .
segments.speaker: S1
